last_episode_to_air.name: Welcome to the Vote
last_episode_to_air.overview: Dave gathers everyone for a lengthy ballot-palooza party to discuss the merits of every candidate and prop on each of their election ballots. Gemma is determined to run a tight ship as their local precinct captain.

name: The Neighborhood
overview: The nicest guy in the Midwest moves his family into a tough neighborhood in Los Angeles where not everyone appreciates his extreme neighborliness. That includes their new next-door neighbor Calvin.

production_companies.name: A Bird and a Bear Entertainment

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Dave Johnson, the friendliest guy in the Midwest, moves his family to a neighborhood in Los Angeles where not everyone looks like him or appreciates his extreme neighborliness.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Repipe
episodes.overview: When a water pipe bursts at the Johnsons’ home, Calvin reluctantly agrees to help Dave repair the damage. Also, Gemma discovers a surprising secret about her new neighbor, Tina.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Spare Key
episodes.overview: Dave gives Calvin a spare key to the Johnsons' house in case of an emergency and is pleasantly surprised when the gesture is reciprocated - or so he thinks.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Housewarming
episodes.overview: When everyone but Calvin accepts Dave and Gemma's invitation to their housewarming party, Dave decides he's finally had enough of Calvin's refusal to welcome him to town.

episodes.name: Welcome to Game Night
episodes.overview: Unexpected revelations are in the cards during the Johnsons' first game night with the Butlers; Gemma is prompted to rectify a past wrong; Malcolm makes a play for a fresh start with his father, Calvin.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Anniversary
episodes.overview: Nothing goes as planned when Dave sets up an anniversary celebration for Gemma and Calvin, and Tina baby-sits the Johnsons' son, Grover.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Barbershop
episodes.overview: Dave is embraced by the patrons of the community barbershop, much to Calvin's dismay.

episodes.name: Welcome to Thanksgiving
episodes.overview: Dave and Gemma host a memorable Thanksgiving in their new home when Dave's politically incorrect mother, Paula, visits from out of town and meets Calvin, Tina and the rest of the Butler family for the first time.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Dinner Guest
episodes.overview: When Calvin and Tina learn Marty has a new girlfriend, Chloe, they insist he invite her over for dinner, with surprising results.

episodes.name: Welcome to Neighborhood Justice
episodes.overview: When Malcolm is robbed and won't reveal the thief, Calvin and Dave team up to crack the case of the missing sneakers; Tina takes a unique approach to teaching Gemma self-defense.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Fundraiser
episodes.overview: Tina gets carried away when she tries to help Gemma ace her first fundraiser as school principal; Dave tries to help Calvin win a special silent auction prize for his mom.

episodes.name: Welcome to Grover's Birthday
episodes.overview: When Dave and Gemma's elaborate plans for Grover's 7th birthday party go awry, Malcolm and Marty come to the rescue. Also, Calvin’s choice of gift winds up sending one person to the hospital.

episodes.name: Welcome to Fight Night
episodes.overview: Calvin reluctantly invites Dave to join his guys' night at home with Malcolm and Marty; Gemma and Tina take their first girls' trip to Vegas and find themselves unexpectedly in the spotlight.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Yard Sale
episodes.overview: Dave convinces Calvin to hold a yard sale, but when longtime neighborhood resident Miss Simpson makes a purchase Calvin quickly regrets, he enlists Dave to help him get the valuable object back.

episodes.name: Welcome to Malcolm's Job
episodes.overview: When Tina agrees to give Grover piano lessons and her son Malcolm lands a job in retail sales, neither Butler has a first day that goes quite according to plan.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Big Payback
episodes.overview: When Gemma has her car repaired at Calvin’s shop, Tina insists she doesn’t need to pay for the work, to Calvin’s consternation. Also, Malcolm and Marty find themselves on the same dating app and vying for the same woman’s attention.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Climb
episodes.overview: When Gemma decides to fire a teacher at her school, she’s unprepared for the aftermath. Also, Calvin gets a surprise when he faces off with his newspaper carrier.

episodes.name: Welcome to Logan #2
episodes.overview: When Calvin and Dave’s college basketball teams go head to head, Dave surprises the Butlers with tickets to the game and also invites one of his best friends from Michigan, Logan #2, who reveals to Calvin surprising new details about Dave.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Camping Trip
episodes.overview: When the Johnsons invite the Butlers to go camping, Dave is taken aback by Calvin’s idea of roughing it. Also, Gemma and Tina cross paths with Maynard (Jim O’Heir), a general store proprietor who may not be as friendly as he seems.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Repass
episodes.overview: When a curmudgeonly resident with few fans in the community passes away, the Butlers step up to host a memorial, leading Calvin to an unexpected revelation about himself.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Conversation
episodes.overview: Dave is thrilled when Calvin invites him golfing, confident that it represents progress in their relationship, but Calvin may have another motive. Also, Gemma and Tina team up to pull off an unforgettable surprise for Malcolm, Marty and Grover

episodes.name: Welcome to the Re-Rack
episodes.overview: One year after the Johnsons moved next door to the Butlers, Dave is eager to take on a bigger role in Calvin’s annual Yardecue and prove how much a part of the community he’s become. But Calvin’s reaction makes it clear that, while the relationship between the two families has grown, the friendship between Calvin and Dave still has a way to go.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Bully
episodes.overview: When Grover gets into a fight with a bully at school, Gemma is torn between her role as principal and wanting to protect her son; Calvin encourages Marty to stand up to his own bully, only to be shocked when he learns who it is.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Fresh Coat
episodes.overview: When Tina decides it's time to make home improvements, Dave volunteers to repaint the Butler house, violating Calvin’s “man code” and setting off a chain of events that impacts both families.

episodes.name: Welcome to Co-Habitation
episodes.overview: When Dave accidentally knocks out the Butlers' power during a heat wave, Calvin and Tina spend the night at the Johnsons' home. Malcolm has some fun at Marty's expense when he crashes at his little brother's refurbished apartment.

episodes.name: Welcome to Soul Food
episodes.overview: The Butlers and Johnsons decide to go on a double-date and everyone gets more than they bargained for at a new restaurant. Grover invites Malcolm and Marty to be the first guests on his new podcast.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Wagon
episodes.overview: Dave and Tina discover a common bond when they attend a concert together. Gemma seeks the Butlers' help when an unwelcome visitor takes up residence in the Johnson home.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Vow Renewal
episodes.overview: As Calvin and Tina near a milestone anniversary, Dave and Gemma decide to help the Butlers have the wedding they missed out on the first time around. Also, Malcolm and Marty prepare an unforgettable performance for their parents’ special occasion.

episodes.name: Welcome to Bowling
episodes.overview: With Calvin down a teammate for his annual bowling championship, Dave offers to fill in and soon finds his mediation skills put to the test when he meets the competition: Calvin’s arch-rivals, the Pink Ladies. Also, Gemma and Tina dare to face off against each other for the top ranking in an arcade game.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Dealbreaker
episodes.overview: When Gemma sets a reluctant Malcolm up on a blind date with a teacher at her school, she discovers new details about the origins of her relationship with Dave. Also, Marty helps Calvin and Tina plan for their future

episodes.name: Welcome to the Digital Divide
episodes.overview: Calvin reluctantly agrees to let Marty create a website for his auto shop in the hopes of drumming up more business. Also, with Gemma out of town for a school retreat, Dave makes it his mission to prove to his son, Grover, that there's more to life than his favorite gadgets.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Scooter
episodes.overview: When the Johnsons' Christmas present for Grover is stolen, Calvin and Dave team up to recover the gift in time for the holiday; a nostalgic Tina tries to get into the Christmas spirit by reviving traditions from when Malcolm and Marty were kids.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Freeloader
episodes.overview: Dave's patience is tested when Gemma's freeloading sister, Brittany (Deborah Baker Jr.), suddenly shows up with plans for an extended stay. Also, Calvin grows frustrated that Malcolm is still living at home, even with a new job

episodes.name: Welcome to the New Pastor
episodes.overview: Tina spends time with the charming new minister she helped select for her church; Calvin suspects the man may be coveting more than just job security; Marty gets a surprise when he finally meets his disruptive, new upstairs neighbor.

episodes.name: Welcome to Trivia Night
episodes.overview: When Calvin and Dave get shown up by Gemma and Marty at a local bar's trivia night, the pair hatch a plan for a do-over to redeem themselves. Also, a frustrated Tina decides to take matters into her own hands in order to finally meet Malcolm's girlfriend, Sofia.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Bad Review
episodes.overview: Dave puts his professional conflict mediator skills to the test when he offers to help Calvin find out why his employees are quitting. Also, Marty devises an elaborate plan to help him earn a date with his new upstairs neighbor.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Hockey Game
episodes.overview: After Calvin enjoys attending a hockey game with Dave, Malcolm and Marty wonder if their neighbor is rubbing off too much on their dad; Tina decides to enjoy the perks that come with her "stardom" when she's mistaken for an A-list celebrity.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Commercial
episodes.overview: When Calvin decides to film a local TV commercial for his business, he enlists Dave, Tina and Marty to help, but it doesn't take long for creative differences to arise. Also, Malcolm considers making a grand gesture when his girlfriend, Sofia, is offered her dream job abroad.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Team
episodes.overview: When Grover joins Calvin's youth basketball team, Gemma finds herself at odds with some of her neighbor's coaching methods; Tina and Marty are forced to confront a long-buried Butler family secret.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Jump
episodes.overview: When Tina receives unexpected news, Calvin, Dave and Gemma encourage her to embrace a new chapter by taking a big leap of faith -- literally -- by learning to skydive; Marty helps Grover create a battle bot for a science competition.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Standoff
episodes.overview: A surprise delivery prompts Dave and Gemma, as well as Calvin and Tina, to examine the power dynamics in their respective relationships.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Speed Bump
episodes.overview: A near-accident awakens Dave's sense of civic duty, prompting him to team up with Calvin to try to improve the safety of their community; a trip to the county fair turns into a nerve-racking adventure for Malcolm, Marty and Grover.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Campaign
episodes.overview: Dave makes a run for city council, working hard to earn Calvin's support, only to have a controversial photo threaten to derail his entire campaign.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Movement
episodes.overview: The Butlers and Johnsons unite when a member of their community is the victim of racial injustice.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Election
episodes.overview: Dave faces off against incumbent Isaiah Evans in a debate for a city council seat, and the race comes to a dramatic conclusion

episodes.name: Welcome to Couples Therapy
episodes.overview: After learning Dave and Gemma occasionally see a couples therapist to keep their marriage strong, Tina decides she and Calvin should do the same, to Calvin's consternation.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Rooster
episodes.overview: An eco-conscious new neighbor, and his pet rooster disrupts the community, leading a desperate Dave and Calvin to team up on a covert mission to restore order. Also, when Tina stops by Marty's apartment for a surprise visit, the youngest Butler son is forced to come clean about a long-held secret.

episodes.name: Welcome To The Road Trip
episodes.overview: Calvin and Dave embark on their first road trip together to a classic car show, only to hit an unexpected roadblock that tests their friendship. Also, while their husbands are away, Tina and Gemma decide to take home repairs at the Butlers' into their own hands.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Turnaround
episodes.overview: Gemma's troublemaking sister, Brittany, returns, claiming she's turned over a new leaf, thanks to a surprising new business venture. Also, Dave finally convinces Calvin to accompany him to an escape room, where they both get more than they bargained for.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Motorcycle
episodes.overview: Malcolm surprises Calvin and Tina when he brings home a new motorcycle, while Dave and Gemma aim to rev up their social life with a spontaneous trip to Las Vegas.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Property
episodes.overview: When Calvin discovers a member of the community plans to sell to greedy developers, he vows to find a buyer closer to home instead. However, the Butlers and Johnsons soon realize that the dilapidated property will require more work than they expected.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Shakedown
episodes.overview: When Gemma's phone is stolen, Dave and Calvin team up to get it back; Malcolm and Marty move into their new house.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Procedure
episodes.overview: When Dave discovers Calvin hasn't seen a physician in nearly a decade, he insists that he schedule a physical; Calvin gets more than he bargained for when Dr. Fisher insists he undergo a routine colonoscopy.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Dad Band
episodes.overview: When Dave's amateur band loses its lead singer just before a gig, Tina offers to fill in; Marty quickly regrets letting his needy boss crash at his new place.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Treehouse
episodes.overview: When a man moves his family from Michigan to Los Angeles, he realizes that the secret to fitting in with his new neighborhood is befriending the opinionated man who lives next door.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Art Class
episodes.overview: When Tina and Gemma get more than they bargained for in a revealing art class, Calvin can't hide his jealousy and takes drastic action. Also, Dave, Marty and Malcolm team up to crack the case of an unfinished mystery novel.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Hero
episodes.overview: Dave earns Calvin’s respect when he thwarts a robbery at the barbershop, until the recognition goes to his head and he starts exaggerating the truth. Also, Marty invites an anxious Gemma to give his new stress-busting hobby a try

episodes.name: Welcome to the Challenge
episodes.overview: When Victor Alvarez, owner of auto-repair chain Motor Boys, tries to steal Calvin’s customers, the Butlers and Johnsons join forces on a plan to drum up business and give back to their community.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Test Run
episodes.overview: When Gemma surprises Dave with wanting another baby, he worries she’s forgotten how difficult a newborn is, so he enlists a robotic doll and Marty’s engineering skills to remind her.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Invasion
episodes.overview: When Calvin's arch-rivals, the Pink Ladies, move their manicure business into the local barbershop, Dave encourages him to make peace until the women take a prank too far and the guys decide to plot revenge. Also, Gemma helps Tina find a creative way to keep tabs on Marty and Malcolm's dating lives.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Surprise
episodes.overview: When Calvin receives a surprise birthday gift involving his father, Dave suggests they spend the day celebrating in a way that honours the late Butler patriarch. Also, an unexpected development changes the Johnsons’ lives forever.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Family
episodes.overview: When Dave starts researching his genealogy, he makes a surprising discovery -- he and Calvin are more than just neighbors; Tina offers to help Gemma when she's overcome with morning sickness, and inadvertently stumbles on a new business idea.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Intervention
episodes.overview: When a member of the community’s behavior becomes increasingly erratic, Calvin and Dave step up to help. Also, Marty undergoes a dramatic makeover to impress a longtime crush.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Sister From Another Mister
episodes.overview: When Gemma hires Alexis to teach at her school, Tina suspects the new teacher may not be quite who she claims to be. Also, Calvin tries to save the community baseball field where he first taught Malcolm how to play.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Porch Pirate
episodes.overview: When Dave and Gemma face a devastating loss, Calvin and Tina offer emotional support and reflect on a period that tested their own family,

episodes.name: Welcome To Your Match
episodes.overview: When Calvin and Tina enlist the services of a professional matchmaker for Marty, they can't help but get too caught up in the process; Dave and Gemma adopt new roles during an unexpected date night.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Haunting
episodes.overview: As Halloween draws near, Calvin tries to determine what's behind the sudden strange occurrences at the Butlers' house; Gemma and Tina question if their days of sexy costumes should be behind them.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Ex-Files
episodes.overview: Calvin is thrilled when he unexpectedly crosses paths with NFL legend Jerome "The Bus" Bettis - until he discovers the Hall of Fame football player shares a history with Tina. Also Dave deals with the fallout of a romantic revelation of his own.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Family Business
episodes.overview: Tina struggles to keep up with her job at Calvin's auto shop due to her burgeoning baking business; Malcolm delays breaking up with a girlfriend when her son becomes an unexpected asset to his youth baseball team.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Splurge
episodes.overview: Calvin decides to splurge on an expensive jacket, then worries it's too special to risk wearing outside the house; Dave and Gemma worry their new friends' daughter is a bad influence on Grover.

episodes.name: Welcome to Jury Duty
episodes.overview: Calvin and Dave are both chosen to serve as jurors on the same trial; Malcolm and Marty get a big surprise when they fail to ask what the movie's about after they rent out their house for a film shoot.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Knockout
episodes.overview: As Dave nears his 40th birthday, Calvin offers to coach his friend for an amateur boxing tournament; sparks fly when Marty meets a new woman at the gym.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Big One
episodes.overview: The Butlers and Johnsons are rattled in different ways after an earthquake strikes; Dave goes to extremes trying to prepare his family for the next earthquake.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Stakeout
episodes.overview: When there's a break-in at Calvin's business, he teams up with Dave for a stakeout to catch the culprit in the act; Gemma is uncharacteristically reluctant to share her new hobby with Tina.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Big Little Leagues
episodes.overview: Calvin and Malcolm butt heads on coaching styles as Malcolm's little league team approaches its first game of the season; Tina tries to win over a food critic she inadvertently offended before he reviews her cupcakes.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Remodel
episodes.overview: After months of crashing with Malcolm and Marty, Calvin and Tina finally reveal the impressive results of their major home renovation; Dave and Gemma decide it's time to have "the talk" with Grover.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Man Code
episodes.overview: When Calvin discovers his friend Lorenzo is harboring a secret, he struggles with whether to share the information with Tina; Dave becomes concerned about Gemma’s growing closeness to a coach at her school.

episodes.name: Welcome to Bro Money, Bro Problems
episodes.overview: Calvin's wealthy and impulsive brother Curtis makes a surprise visit, which creates chaos in the Butlers' lives; Dave and Gemma run into challenges while trying to declutter their home.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Feud
episodes.overview: When Dave's job requires him to mediate a feud between two wealthy brothers, Calvin tries to help but winds up complicating the process; Gemma turns to Tina for assistance in navigating Grover's first crush.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Quinceañera
episodes.overview: Calvin and Tina offer to throw a quinceañera for a teen Calvin in mentoring at his auto shop; Dave and Gemma introduce Malcolm to a college baseball coach who has the potential to change his future.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Mama Drama
episodes.overview: When Calvin is honored by the Chamber of Commerce for the positive impact his business has had on the community, he hopes to finally gain the approval of his mother, Marilyn.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Dream Girls
episodes.overview: When Tina reunites with her former girl group after decades apart, old issues are reignited, threatening to derail the trio's big performance.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Ring
episodes.overview: As Marty prepares to propose to his girlfriend, Calvin and Tina work with party planner Chika to throw a celebration that properly honors their future daughter-in-law's Nigerian heritage.

episodes.name: Welcome Back to the Neighborhood
episodes.overview: When Dave decides to disconnect the Johnson home from the grid, he inadvertently causes a community-wide power outage, much to Calvin’s frustration. Also, in the wake of Marty’s engagement, Tina struggles with no longer being the primary woman in her son’s life.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Pit Stop, How May I Help You?
episodes.overview: When Calvin takes Dave's suggestion to try a new method of promoting his business, he soon comes to regret it; Gemma recruits Tina to rescue her struggling after-school music program.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Ballgame
episodes.overview: When Malcolm treats Calvin, Dave, Gemma and Grover to VIP tickets to a Dodgers game, the outing isn't quite a home run; Marty's movie night with fiancée Necie goes sideways when Tina decides to join.

episodes.name: Welcome to the New Deal
episodes.overview: When Calvin is overwhelmed by work, Dave volunteers to counsel his friend, while also logging hours necessary for his therapist certification at the VA. Also, Tina confides in Gemma that she’s eager to make a career change.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Art of Negotiation
episodes.overview: When Dave is up for a promotion at work, Calvin tries to help him negotiate a raise from his penny-pinching new boss, Gregory. Also, Tina struggles with whether to share some sensitive information with Gemma

episodes.name: Welcome to the Hot Prospect
episodes.overview: When Calvin stumbles upon a big business opportunity, he must convince Malcolm to help him so he can seal the deal. Also, Gemma is forced to confront a secret from her beauty pageant past when a friend from her hometown arrives.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Working Week
episodes.overview: When Calvin hires Grover to work part time at his business, he soon realizes the preteen is not a good fit; Marty and Necie reconsider their living situation.

episodes.name: Welcome to What Used to Be the Neighborhood
episodes.overview: When Calvin’s favorite restaurant closes and is replaced by a flashy pet spa, he worries the community is losing too many small businesses and starts a campaign to only buy local. Also, Tina helps Necie prepare a special surprise for Marty.

episodes.name: Welcome to Our Time
episodes.overview: Calvin weighs the pros and cons of making a major life change; Marty turns to Dave for help dealing with a troubling discovery.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Getaway
episodes.overview: Calvin and Tina decide to take the honeymoon they never had to Madrid; Dave and Gemma team up with Malcolm and Marty on a project intended to surprise Calvin upon his return.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Cornhole
episodes.overview: When Tina insists Calvin find something to do in retirement, he decides to enter a competitive cornhole tournament; Marty plans an elaborate “groom-posal” to ask Malcolm to be his best man.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Bachelor Party
episodes.overview: A bombshell about Marty's future plans leaves Calvin and Tina reeling; Dave unleashes his wild side at Marty's bachelor party.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Last Dance
episodes.overview: The Butlers and Johnsons come together to support Marty in the aftermath of a major life change.

episodes.name: Welcome to New Beginnings
episodes.overview: When a new business in the community begins using Calvin's likeness without his permission, Dave volunteers to mediate on his friend's behalf.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Next Big Thing
episodes.overview: Calvin and Marty consider starting a new business together; Dave sets up a mini library stocked with a self-help book he authored.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Jungle
episodes.overview: When a mountain lion gets loose in the area, the Butlers and Johnsons must shelter in place together, leading to some unexpected revelations.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Milestone
episodes.overview: Calvin struggles to find the perfect birthday gift for Tina; Gemma works a connection to actor Jerry O'Connell, whose kids attend Walcott Academy, to secure VIP tickets to "The Talk" for her school's fundraiser.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Future
episodes.overview: Calvin and Marty encounter difficulties trying to secure financing for their new business; Dave invites his boss to Grover's 13th birthday party, much to Gemma's frustration.

episodes.name: Welcome to the New Do
episodes.overview: With her usual stylist unavailable, Gemma decides to use Tina’s hairdresser for an important work event; Malcom discovers a connection with his new professor.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Other Neighborhood
episodes.overview: Calvin and Marty are surprised when their new business sparks protests from residents concerned about gentrification; Grover's family tree project reveals fresh details about the whereabouts of Dave's estranged father, who left when he was a child.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Fatherhood
episodes.overview: When Dave's estranged father, Lamar, arrives in town eager to reconnect, his son finally learns the truth about his disappearance 30 years prior; Marty struggles to fire an underperforming employee.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Opening Night
episodes.overview: Calvin pushes Marty to move up the opening of their new business to get a valuable celebrity endorsement from D.L. Hughley; Dave continues to struggle with the return of his father; Tina and Gemma prepare for the opening of their new school play.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Foos Box
episodes.overview: Gemma and Dave are adjusting to Grover growing up and becoming a teenager, and Marty and Calvin are struggling with different management styles at work. Also, we meet one of Marty's new employees, Courtney, who might become something more.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Awkward Conversations
episodes.overview: Marty and Courtney are navigating the pregnancy news and what it all means for their future, while Malcolm is dealing with his own workplace relationship.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Other Butlers
episodes.overview: Calvin and Tina are looking to remodel their home when they uncover discriminatory processes with their bank's appraiser. Meanwhile, Marty asks Trey for fatherly advice on co-parenting with Courtney.

episodes.name: Welcome to Grandfatherhood
episodes.overview: Calvin is adjusting to getting older and the new stages of parenting, while Malcolm questions his career path. Lamar shows up to spend more time with Grover, which forces Gemma and Dave to loosen the reins a bit.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Front Window
episodes.overview: While Calvin is cooped up at home recovering, he begins spying on his neighbors from the window. He comes to believe that something sketchy is going on across the street, so the whole crew helps him figure out how to catch their new neighbor in the act.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Walkout
episodes.overview: While Gemma is holding a fundraiser for a new school pool, Tina and the other teachers are being overworked. Meanwhile, Dave convinces Calvin to finally commit to doing physical therapy for his knee.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Stand-Off
episodes.overview: Gemma and Tina are at odds with one another and Dave and Calvin try to bring them back together; Marty is sick and not handling it well, so Malcolm fills in for him and goes to a baby class with Courtney.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Baby Shower
episodes.overview: Courtney and Marty deal with some baby shower drama with Tina, while Lamar adjusts to a new job at the Fuse Box.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Name Drop
episodes.overview: Marty and Courtney's baby name gets spread around because nobody can keep a secret. Meanwhile, Dave is assigned the ever-complicated task of assembling the diaper changing table.

episodes.name: Welcome to the World
episodes.overview: The whole crew heads out to see Toni Braxton live in concert, but just as the show begins, Courtney's water breaks.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Neighborhood, Daphne
episodes.overview: Marty and Courtney bring baby Daphne home from the hospital and Calvin is surprised to learn that Marty plans to take the paternity leave Dave offered in the employee handbook.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Big Sleep
episodes.overview: As Marty and Courtney struggle to get their newborn to sleep, the entire Butler family suffers along with them.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Vote
episodes.overview: Dave gathers everyone for a lengthy ballot-palooza party to discuss the merits of every candidate and prop on each of their election ballots. Gemma is determined to run a tight ship as their local precinct captain.
